about_the_game:
Add the Fashionista Boyfriend personality to Signed and Sealed With a Kiss with this expansion pack!

MEET YOUR BOYFRIEND

FEATURES

  • Additional decisions and scene variations for pre-existing content
  • One brand-new personality and story to explore, including brand-new scenes
  • 5 new CGs + variations
  • 2 to 5 more hours of gameplay

content_descriptors.notes:
Partial nudity and sexually suggestive images of men are shown on-screen at several points. Sexual topics and innuendos are discussed occasionally. 

The player may choose to engage in a consensual sexual relationship with their Boyfriend, including various levels of suggestive text descriptions of what happens, if the player has opted to allow such content in-game.

fullgame.name: Signed and Sealed With a Kiss

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: 1.66 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080px
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X version Leopard 10.6
  • Processor: 1.66 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080px
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

name: Signed and Sealed With a Kiss - Fashionista Expansion
